actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exclude alcoholic beverages from those articles eligible for duty free treatment as gift articles imported by nonresidents.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedule of the United States to exclude alcoholic beverages from those articles eligible for duty-free importation as gift articles imported by residents or nonresidents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exclude alcoholic beverages from those articles eligible for duty free treatment as gift articles imported by nonresidents.
